name: Prof-phils-pokedex
body:
# INTRO
This is PROF PHILOU'S POKEDEX VERSION 1.0 (**PPP** for short).  
**PPP** is a CPP enhanced pokedex made for pokemmo especially.  
**PPP** allows you to add your pokemons to a local DB, then generates stats & stuffs about your pokemons  

# IMPORTANT
Please notice that **PPP** has been made (and is being code) for pokemmo so only the first 3 generations are available.  
***
## FEATURES
- ADDING POKEMONS TO **PPP**
- COMPARING POKEMON TO AVERAGE STATS OF HIS LEVEL

## FEATURES TO COME
- More stats & stuffs
- Centralized DB
-  **???**
***
### KNOWN BUGS
- No bugs found yet.

### OTHER
- **PPP** is made with C++ 11, and for windows, although it may compile on linux, i havent test so i dunno
- **PPP** uses awesomium which enables html/css/js UI
- **PPP** uses [pokeapi](http://pokeapi.co/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
